title: B-flat major melodic dictation - bass, simple met.

content.question: The melody will be played three times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a 1-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a euphonium. Now listen to the melody for the first time and begin to note it.

frqParts.text: The melody will be played three times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a 1-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a euphonium. Now listen to the melody for the first time and begin to note it.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Notate the pitches and rhythm of a performed melody (in treble or bass clef; in a major or minor key; may include chromatically altered pitches).
